product_title: Gorgeous Modernist Pottery Urn with Lid, Made by Marc Hansen. Good Product.
product_details: Acoma Pueblo Pottery Wedding Vase by Westly Begaye. Westly was born into the Navajo Nation in 1965. He was taught by his long time companion, Marie Francis Vallo, an Acoma potter who is the mother of Leland, Kim and Thomas Vallo. Westly's work is a fusing of Navajo and Acoma traditions.

product_title: Vintage glazed pottery vases with traditional Mexican folk art hand painted designs.
product_details: Hanson exhibited at the Syracuse Ceramic Nationals in the 1950s-60s.  Appears in book: 'Ceramics: A Potter's Handbook' by Glenn C. Nelson.  Exhibited at The Art Institute of Chicago: 'Ceramics by Marc Hensen, Earl Hooks, and Tomiya Matsuda', March 18-May4, 1967.  Exhibited at Kia, Kalamazoo Institute of Arts, 1969.

product_title: Awaji Pottery Art Deco Japanese Vase in White Blue Flambe Glaze. Curled Over The Wide Shoulder
product_details: Awaji Pottery vase in Art Deco form with well defined, rolled over lip, little handles curled over the wide shoulder, and striking blue and white flambe glaze, circa 1930.

product_title: Vintage Awaji Pottery Large Japanese Jar Dripped and Splashed Glaze Vase
product_details: Vintage Awaji vase with glazes dripped and splashed on, circa 1930. Measures: 8 1/2' high, 9' diameter. Excellent condition.

product_title: Antique Art Nouveau Awaji Pottery Bottle Vase Crackle Turquoise Monochrome Glaze
product_details: Antique Awaji pottery bottle form vase in turquoise and cream crackle glaze, circa 1910. 12 inches high, 5 inches diameter. Unmarked. Drill hole professionally repaired, as shown.

product_title: 1940s Hull Art Pottery Bow Knot Basket
product_details: Extremely RARE Roseville Pottery Bow Knot basket B-29-12. This was manufactured in the late forties. The matt finished pattern is in pastel pink and blue. According to the book, Hull, the Heavenly Pottery, (last edition 2001) this is one of the most expensive pieces, valued at $2,000. One owner.

product_title: Turkish Handmade Ceramic Tulip Shaped Vases in Vivid Blue Color
product_details: Handmade tulip decoration vase set. 3 pieces. Vivid colored house warming gift. It will suit your home with its vivid colors and wonderful patterns. It is also a great product that you can gift to your loved ones.
